TableSpec.Name: Child Project Extension
TableSpec.Description: Child Project - Project Information - organization constituent extension
TableSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

TextField.Name: CHILDPROJECTTYPEOTHER
TextField.Description: Description for Other child project type

ForeignKeyField.Name: COUNTRYEXTENSIONID
ForeignKeyField.Description: Country constituent org record that the project is in as found in the Sponsorship Location hierarchy.

EnumField.Name: QUOTATYPECODE
EnumField.Description: Specify whether it's Project or Country quota

ComputedColumnField.Name: DECREASEDQUOTA
ComputedColumnField.Expression: case when APPROVEDQUOTAINITIAL > dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_CURRENTQUOTA(ID) then APPROVEDQUOTAINITIAL - dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_CURRENTQUOTA(ID) else 0 end

ComputedColumnField.Name: GROWTHQUOTA
ComputedColumnField.Expression: case when APPROVEDQUOTAINITIAL < dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_CURRENTQUOTA(ID) then dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_CURRENTQUOTA(ID) - APPROVEDQUOTAINITIAL else 0 end

NumberField.Description: Community population

TextField.Description: Name of province, state or region

TextField.Description: Name of major city or name of nearest city

NumberField.Description: Distance in relation to major city above

EnumField.Name: DISTANCETOCITYUNITOFMEASUREMENTCODE
EnumField.Description: Unit of measurement that the distance to city is measured in

NumberField.Name: NEARESTCITYPOPULATION
NumberField.Description: Population of major city above

NumberField.Name: WARMESTMONTHAVGTEMPERATURE
NumberField.Description: Average temperature

EnumField.Name: WARMESTMONTHAVGTEMPERATUREUNITOFMEASURECODE
EnumField.Description: Unit of measurement used in the warmest month average temperature

NumberField.Description: Average temperature

EnumField.Description: Unit of measurement used in the coolest month average temperature

NumberField.Name: NUMCHRISTIANCHURCHES
NumberField.Description: Number of evangelical Christian churches

NumberField.Name: PERCENTPROTESTANT
NumberField.Description: Percentage of local population that is Protestant

TextField.Name: CHRISTIANORGS
TextField.Description: Name of Christian agencies/organizations providing relief, development, or programmatic interventions for children

NumberField.Name: DISTANCETOMEDICALFACILITY
NumberField.Description: Distance to nearest medical facility

EnumField.Description: Unit of measurement that the distance to city is measured in

NumberField.Description: Number of days to nearest medical facility

NumberField.Description: Number of hours to nearest medical facility

NumberField.Name: MINUTESTOMEDICALFACILITY
NumberField.Description: Number of minutes to nearest medical facility

CodeTableField.Name: HIGHESTEDUCATIONAVAILABLECODEID
CodeTableField.Description: Higest education available in local community

TextField.Name: EDUCATIONTYPEOTHERDESC
TextField.Description: Types of education available - Other description

NumberField.Name: PERCENTCHILDRENNOTINSCHOOL
NumberField.Description: Percentage of children of school age who are not in school

NumberField.Name: PERCENTCHILDRENCOMPLETEDPRIMARYSCHOOL
NumberField.Description: Percentage of children who have completed primary school

NumberField.Name: PERCENTYOUTHCOMPLETEDSECONDARYSCHOOL
NumberField.Description: Percentage of youth who have completed secondary school

MoneyField.Name: AVGFAMILYMONTHLYINCOMEINUSDOLLARS
MoneyField.Description: Local average family monthly income in US dollars

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONHERDING
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Animal herding

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONDAYLABOR
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Day labor

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONDOMESTIC
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Domestic Services

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONFACTORY
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Factory work

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONGOVERNMENT
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Government worker

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONSTREETVENDING
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Street vending

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONFARMING
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Subsistence farming

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONTRADING
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Petty or market trading

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONPLANTATION
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Plantation work

BooleanField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONPORTER
BooleanField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Porter or Coolie

TextField.Name: PRIMARYOCCUPATIONOTHERDESC
TextField.Description: Primary occupation of adults - Other - description

NumberField.Name: AVGHOURSPERWEEK
NumberField.Description: Average number of hours adults work per week

NumberField.Name: UNEMPLOYMENTRATE
NumberField.Description: Unemployment rate

BooleanField.Name: SOCIALISSUESTRAUMA
BooleanField.Description: Social issues - Trauma or Post traumatic stree disorder

EnumField.Name: CHILDLEGALPROTECTIONCODE
EnumField.Description: Whether a community is aware of the Convention on the Rights of the Child and whether it is enforced

EnumField.Name: CHILDLABORCODE
EnumField.Description: The degree to which children participate in the labor pool and the priority of education.

EnumValue.Translation: Do not participate in labor pool

BooleanField.Name: LEGALPROTECTIONAWARENOTENFORCED
BooleanField.Description: Legal Protection - Community is aware of the Convention on the Rights of the Child, but it is not enforced. There are local laws to protect children, but they are not enforced.

BooleanField.Name: LEGALPROTECTIONNOTAWARE
BooleanField.Description: Legal Protection - Community is unaware of the Convention on the Rights of the Child. There are no local laws to protect children.

BooleanField.Name: LEGALPROTECTIONAWAREENFORCED
BooleanField.Description: Legal Protection - Community is aware of the Covention on the Rights of the Child and effort is made to educate and post information on this topic. There are local laws to protect children and they are enforced.

BooleanField.Name: CHILDLABORREGULARLYINLABORPOOL
BooleanField.Description: Child Labor - Children regularly participate in the labor pool and in dangerous tasks, such as farming, factory work, and exposure to hazardous materials.

BooleanField.Name: CHILDLABORRSOMETIMESINLABORPOOL
BooleanField.Description: Child Labor - Children sometimes participate in the labor pool and in dangerous tasks, but do have the opportunity for education.

BooleanField.Name: CHILDLABORNOTINLABORPOOL
BooleanField.Description: Child Labor - Children do not participate in the labor pool. Education for children is highly encouraged and supported.

BooleanField.Name: CHILDCAREWHENPARENTABSENTADOPTION
BooleanField.Description: How are children typically cared for when one or both parents are absent or not living? - Adoption

BooleanField.Name: CHILDCAREWHENPARENTABSENTEXTENDEDFAMILY
BooleanField.Description: How are children typically cared for when one or both parents are absent or not living? - Extended family

BooleanField.Name: CHILDCAREWHENPARENTABSENTFOSTERCARE
BooleanField.Description: How are children typically cared for when one or both parents are absent or not living? - Foster care

BooleanField.Name: CHILDCAREWHENPARENTABSENTINSTITUTION
BooleanField.Description: How are children typically cared for when one or both parents are absent or not living? - Institution

BooleanField.Name: CHILDCAREWHENPARENTABSENTNOCARE
BooleanField.Description: How are children typically cared for when one or both parents are absent or not living? - No care available

BooleanField.Name: CHILDCAREWHENPARENTABSENTOTHER
BooleanField.Description: How are children typically cared for when one or both parents are absent or not living? - Other

TextField.Name: CHILDCAREWHENPARENTABSENTOTHERDESC
TextField.Description: How are children typically cared for when one or both parents are absent or not living? - Other description

DateField.Name: CLOSUREDATE
DateField.Description: The date the project was closed.
